long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
vidmarker- "your video bookmark"

Vidmarker is a powerful extension that lets you easily bookmark your favorite moments in any video. With just a single click, you can save the current timestamp and jump back to it anytime you want. This makes it perfect for anyone who wants to take notes, remember key points, or simply pick up where they left off. Whether you're watching a tutorial, lecture, or just your favorite cat video, Video Bookmarker is the perfect tool to help you get the most out of your video experience. Try it out today and start bookmarking like a pro!
